thread.section_title: Hotel Therese - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Avoid this hotel
thread.title_full: Avoid this hotel - Review of Hotel Therese, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: aprican74
title: Avoid this hotel
text:
Location is great... but if you want to have the feeling to share your room with the one aside: welcome! You can hear the occupant of the room in his shower and looking for his clothes...not mentioning the toilets!
I mentioned that to the reception and told me that it is the first time that someone complaint. The receptionist's attitude was so arrogant (and I am French...).
Just avoid this hotel if you want to rest and have the feeling to be alone in your room.
It is 1.00am and I have just been waken up by my neighboor who is having a bath..
Not to mention that bathroom was far to be brand new, shower system not convenient... and suspicious carpet.
If you still want to try... avoid room 42 at least!
